actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit under section 38 with respect to certain depreciable property used by hospitals owned and operated by governmental units.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for depreciable property used by hospitals owned or operated by governmental units.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit under section 38 with respect to certain depreciable property used by hospitals owned and operated by governmental units.
